# Domain-Specific Preset Flags

Quick presets for common development domains and workflows.

**Estimated tokens: ~150**

---

**--frontend**
- Trigger: UI development, component work
- Behavior: Activate frontend-optimized stack
- Auto-enables: react-specialist, supersaiyan, a11y checks, browser testing
- Focuses: Component design, state management, responsive design, accessibility
- Tools: Storybook, component testing, visual regression
- Best for: React, Vue, Svelte, Angular development

**--backend**
- Trigger: API development, database work, services
- Behavior: Activate backend-optimized stack
- Auto-enables: api-documenter, security-auditor, performance-engineer
- Focuses: API design, database optimization, security, scalability
- Tools: API testing, load testing, profiling
- Best for: Node.js, Python, Go, Java backends

**--fullstack**
- Trigger: End-to-end feature development
- Behavior: Activate both frontend + backend stacks
- Auto-enables: All specialists, integration testing, E2E validation
- Focuses: Full feature implementation, API contracts, data flow
- Tools: Complete testing suite, deployment automation
- Best for: Feature development across entire stack

**--data-science / --ml**
- Trigger: Data analysis, ML pipelines, notebooks
- Behavior: Activate data science stack
- Auto-enables: Jupyter support, visualization, statistical analysis
- Focuses: Data exploration, model training, experiment tracking
- Tools: pandas, numpy, scikit-learn, visualization libraries
- Best for: Data analysis, machine learning, research
